EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-12-05 Takeways on AWS ReInvent.ES-20181119-Invite Send 2.ES 2 - HTML In
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}} Here's What You Should Know After AWS re:Invent
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>
Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, You're invited to join our next webinar, Top 5 Takeaways from AWS re:Invent 2018, on Wednesday, December 5th at 11 a.m. ET, <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]> for a post-event recap from event attendee and Director of Technical Marketing, Eric Wright. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>
Reserve Your Seat <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>
In this <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>30-minute live webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>, we will review the top announcements from AWS re:Invent, what to expect in the cloud in 2019, and how organizations like yours are benefitting from migrating their workloads to AWS. All registered guests will be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there! Regards, Andrew PS. If you can't attend live, feel free to sign up anyways <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-aws-reinvent-takeaways/]]>, and I'll send you the recording afterward.
